function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Spread and transmission of virus in public places","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large-scale monitoring using chatbot-based systems may infringe on privacy and data security","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Analysis of travel card data may pose risks to individual privacy and data security","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on centralized cloud platforms for reporting health information may pose privacy and security risks","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on smart solutions for hotspot identification may lead to neglect of other critical factors contributing to disease spread","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collection of personal data through face scanners and iot devices raises privacy concerns and potential misuse of data","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on machine learning and ai models for disease prediction may lead to inaccuracies and false predictions","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential misuse of voice recognition apps and ai models for discrimination and stigmatization of individuals","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential security incidents due to data exchange","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of crises such as covid-19","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Coordination and collaboration challenges in different contexts","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fragmented management in public health emergency systems","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access to data for evidence-based decision making","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to identify and understand social and environmental risks compounded by pandemics","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited cooperation between different departments, hospitals, and institutions","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fragmented governance and limited cooperation between different sectors and levels of governance","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cities not well prepared for prevailing viruses despite having smart infrastructure","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Timely implementation of border control and closure of land and sea borders","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Repurposing integrated command and control centers as covid-19 war rooms","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited pre-event preparations for disease outbreaks","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of investment in smart city infrastructure","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Discussion of disease hotspots and prevention indicating potential for disease outbreak.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Simultaneous data collection and analysis may lead to data contamination and bias in interpretation","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Combining and synthesizing information without rigorous validation may result in the propagation of inaccuracies","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Thematic analysis approach may introduce subjective bias and interpretation variability","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of relevant literature on smart solutions and technologies for pandemic and cities","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapidly expanding research leading to oversight of relevant literature","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of universal definition for smartness leading to ambiguity in implementation and evaluation","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Focus on technological dimensions of smart cities leading to neglect of non-physical components","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of diverse smart technologies for covid-19 pandemic response without clear evaluation criteria","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of preparedness for subsequent waves of the pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate measures for absorption of immediate aftermath of the pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continued spread of covid-19 in some countries leading to further waves of infections and lockdowns","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for future pandemics to emerge","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access to clinical psychotherapists for marginalized populations","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate social support for isolated individuals during covid-19","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of mental health strategies in pandemic areas","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective communication leading to increased social fear related to covid-19","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate psychological support leading to negative emotions and psychological distress","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of early and effective management of health emergency in hospitals","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perceived difficulties in interpreting quarantine protocols and lack of clear rationale/guidelines.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low resilience to social threats such as pandemics leading to higher risk of developing psychiatric conditions.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low perception of social support leading to increased likelihood of developing psychological distress and psychiatric conditions.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases due to inadequate information from public health authorities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Symptoms related to quarantine reported in 28% of parents relative to 6% of those who were not quarantined.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher depressive symptoms were reported in subjects with higher rates of quarantine.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of alexithymic traits may reduce psychological resilience in some individuals.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Loneliness and boredom from social isolation","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Worry and fear related to physical symptoms potentially linked to infection","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social isolation and uncertainty related to restrictions and lockdown measures","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"}]}
